item.title: Deploy OpenTelemetry Demo Applciation
item.description: Introduction For this workshop, we’ll be using the OpenTelemetry Demo Application running in Kubernetes. This application is for an online retailer and includes more than a dozen services written in many different languages. While metrics, traces, and logs are being collected from this application, this workshop is primarily focused on how Splunk Observability Cloud can be used to more efficiently monitor infrastructure. Pre-requisites You should have access to the EC2 instance provided in section 1.
